name: Impact Wrench
discription: Used driving in Bolts

name: Sawzaw
discription: Used to cut through any wood or metal

name: Impact Driver
discription: Used for driving in screws and small bolts

name: Circular Saw
discription: Used for cutting wood sheets

name: Miter Saw
discription: Used for cut wood boards. Can cut at angles.

name: Welder
discription: Used to melt 2 peices of metals together.

name: Table Saw
discription: Used for cutting stright lines in sheets of wood

name: Orbital Sander
discription: Used to smooth out wood

name: Drill
discription: Used for making holes and driving in screw

name: Angle Grinder
discription: Used to cut through metal

name: Band Saw
discription: tool designed for making precise and intricate cuts in a variety of materials.

name: Hammer
discription: Used for striking nails or metals etc.

name: Stright Blade Screw Driver
discription: Used for driving in flathead screws

name: Phlips head Screw Driver
discription: Used for driving in philps head screws

name: Hand Saw
discription: Used for cutting many things including wood, plastic, and much more

name: Wrench Set
discription: Used for tightening bolts in many sizes

name: Socket Set
discription: Used for tighening bolts in many sizes and shapes, but in a quicker fashion

name: Measuring Tape
discription: Used for measuring the distance of something. Useful for measurments for cutting, shaping, etc.

name: Axe
discription: Used for cutting things with blunt force

name: Wire strippers
discription: Used for stripping and cutting wire

name: Pliers
discription: Used for pulling nails, staples, screws out of things; including wires. Also useful for anything you need to get a grip on.

name: Leveler
discription: Used for telling if a surface is level or not

name: Pry bar
discription: Used for prying something open or out of something. It is also used for holding something open

name: Staple Gun
discription: Used for stapling things. You also need staples for this to be useful

name: Chisel
discription: Used for scraping and cutting wood, metal, or stone.

name: Mallet
discription: Used for driving dowels or chisels. Softer type of hammer with more surface area

name: Utility Knife
discription: Used for cutting things including plastic, banding, and anything you may need to cut with a knife. Comes with multiple blades

name: Sandpaper
discription: Used for metal or wood to soften edges, corners, and rough spots on the material

name: Adjustable Wrench
discription: Used for tightening bolts of many sizes. Can adjust to many different sizes to tighten or loosen different sized bolts/knuts

name: C-Clamp
discription: Used for holding something in place to do other work on it. This includes any material you may need to hold in place.

name: Needle Nose Pliers
discription: Used for reaching into tight areas to grasp something. Also used for cutting and twisting wire. Also can be used for pulling staples

name: Paint Brush
discription: Used for painting any object to another color or coat.

name: Shovel
discription: Used for scooping dirt, snow, rocks, or anything you need to pick up.
